channel.title: CVE Feed for Miled -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Miled -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34172|2024-08-02T16:01:54.217Z -- miled -- wordpress%20social%20login
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Miled WordPress Social Login plugin <= 3.0.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-4773|2024-08-02T07:38:00.564Z -- miled -- wordpress%20social%20login
item.description: The WordPress Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'wordpress_social_login_meta' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.0.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2023-34023|2024-08-02T15:54:14.119Z -- miled -- wordpress%20social%20login
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Miled WordPress Social Login plugin <= 3.0.4 versions.
